/* USE : TemplateMapper.saveTemplate */ MERGE INTO TB_CM_PRINT_TEMPL tcpt USING DUAL ON ( tcpt.PRT_CLASS_CD = #{prtClassCd} AND tcpt.TEMPLT_CD = #{templtCd} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET tcpt.TEMPLT_NM = #{templtNm}, tcpt.PRT_FORM = #{prtForm}, tcpt.MOD_DT = #{modDt}, tcpt.MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( PRT_CLASS_CD, TEMPLT_CD, TEMPLT_NM, PRT_FORM, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{prtClassCd}, ( SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(MAX(TEMPLT_CD) + 1, '000')) FROM TB_CM_PRINT_TEMPL WHERE PRT_CLASS_CD = #{prtClassCd} ), #{templtNm}, #{prtForm}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
